author: Nintendo of America
description:
Hades II – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, Physical Edition is now available: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/hades-II-nintendo-switch-2-edition-125246/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01 

Battle beyond the Underworld using dark sorcery to take on the Titan of Time in this bewitching sequel to the award-winning rogue-like dungeon crawler. Physical version contains Character Compendium booklet and download code for digital soundtrack. A physical version of Hades II – Nintendo Switch Edition is also available! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #HadesII 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Hades II – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition – Physical Edition Launch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Episode ten of the #Splatoon3 North American League Show is available now! Get a recap of last week's action, speculation on which team might take home the gold, and check out a fun segment featuring our hard-working announcers taking a little break with Mario Kart World!

Watch this week's Splatoon 3 North American League Event #10 livestream on Saturday, Nov 22 at 4pm PT here: https://youtube.com/live/6oc_qlSd6us

Interested in competing? Register here: https://youtube.com/live/ogCD67khinA

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
title: The Splatoon 3 North American League Show – Episode 10
